reviews.text: This place is amazing. Has to be the best pizza in this area. Why would anyone you eat anywhere else. Adria our server was fantasric. She  really worked hard but made time to check on us.
I have been coming here for 5 years and this Joes tops everyone in the area. We came here for valentine‚Äôs day, and they did not disappoint. Food was great and the touch of love in every dish!

Sorry pics are after the first round of diners at the pizza buffet! We ordered three pizzas for our  diverse family tastes and needs. The Veggie, pepperoni sausage and green pepper, and a sausage and black olive, everyone was happy and satisfied and asked why we don‚Äôt order from here more! We will from now on. Also arrived exactly on time I was given for delivery and their delivery person was super pleasant.
Love Joe‚Äôs Pizza! The service is always amazing, super friendly, quick, and really attentive. Plus, the pizza is delicious!

We just left the Edwardsville location.  Granted they were busy on a Saturday but we have been there when it has been busy before.  We sat at our table for over 10 minutes.  No one ever came to take our drink order, say hi or anything.  We had 3 servers go by us and no one said one word.  In the meantime, someone sat down behind us and within a couple of minutes a server came over to their booth.  So we got up and left and went down the road to another restaurant.   Very poor service.  Next time we will go to a different location.

editorial_summary.overview: Relaxed Italian eatery serving pizza & pasta dishes with housemade sauces, plus sandwiches & sides.

recentReviews.text: This place is amazing. Has to be the best pizza in this area. Why would anyone you eat anywhere else. Adria our server was fantasric. She  really worked hard but made time to check on us.
Delicious food.  Like their pizza and pasta sauces.

I order a pizza on DD. I wanted it to be handed to me. They left my food in the hotel lobby. After I called and asked where my food is, they said it was dropped off in the lobby 10 minutes ago.
My pizza was cold and it was also not very good. I will not order here again.

Always great!
Everyone is so awesome.
Yummy food. Pizza is the best. Pasta is just amazing.
Always good service and great food!

As a regular customer for over 15 years I can give an honest review.
Their large menu offers something for everyone.  The food is consistently good and they provide top customer service. The longevity of their staff and the fact that the  Owners are often on site is reflected in the cleanliness and efficiency of their service.

Great casual restaurant to plan a family or neighborhood gathering.
Delicious Chicago style pizza. Their regular pizza is the best in Edwardsville. Even has gluten free option. They push for tips for all pizza orders. Lots of TV's for watching.

detailedReviews.author: Rv Escape Pod Adventures
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing. Has to be the best pizza in this area. Why would anyone you eat anywhere else. Adria our server was fantasric. She  really worked hard but made time to check on us.

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Otto
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food.  Like their pizza and pasta sauces.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Morgart
detailedReviews.text:
I order a pizza on DD. I wanted it to be handed to me. They left my food in the hotel lobby. After I called and asked where my food is, they said it was dropped off in the lobby 10 minutes ago.
My pizza was cold and it was also not very good. I will not order here again.

detailedReviews.author: scott bilbrey
detailedReviews.text:
Always great!
Everyone is so awesome.
Yummy food. Pizza is the best. Pasta is just amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Tamara Grammer
detailedReviews.text: Always good service and great food!

detailedReviews.author: Carol Foreman
detailedReviews.text:
As a regular customer for over 15 years I can give an honest review.
Their large menu offers something for everyone.  The food is consistently good and they provide top customer service. The longevity of their staff and the fact that the  Owners are often on site is reflected in the cleanliness and efficiency of their service.

Great casual restaurant to plan a family or neighborhood gathering.

detailedReviews.author: John Litvin
detailedReviews.text: Delicious Chicago style pizza. Their regular pizza is the best in Edwardsville. Even has gluten free option. They push for tips for all pizza orders. Lots of TV's for watching.

detailedReviews.author: Ed Bailey
detailedReviews.text: We stopped for lunch right at ... lunchtime.   Guess what, they were busy.  The stop for lunch here was quite understandable given the time of day.  The pizza was good ... the service was good.  A good stop.

detailedReviews.author: morgan
detailedReviews.text: Joe‚Äôs traditional wings are hands down the best in town! My go to flavor is definitely the sweet chili, it‚Äôs unbeatable!

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Heinemeier
detailedReviews.text: Love Joe‚Äôs Pizza!  Polite and efficient service!

detailedReviews.author: Living In The Moment 5
detailedReviews.text: Everything was great! Our waiter  Evony was awesome.üòä

detailedReviews.author: Kim D
detailedReviews.text: Friendly staff, awesome sauce and pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Silver Light Fox
detailedReviews.text: Closest thing to NYC style pizza your gonna find in illinois, my only gripe I have is the stuffed crust pizza, is more like a chichago style , I was thinking it was only cheese in the crust but it's throughout the whole pizza, other than that it is very good, and the workers are very friendly, ill be back again.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Ambrose
detailedReviews.text: Love Joe‚Äôs Pizza! The service is always amazing, super friendly, quick, and really attentive. Plus, the pizza is delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Darrell Jones
detailedReviews.text: We just left the Edwardsville location.  Granted they were busy on a Saturday but we have been there when it has been busy before.  We sat at our table for over 10 minutes.  No one ever came to take our drink order, say hi or anything.  We had 3 servers go by us and no one said one word.  In the meantime, someone sat down behind us and within a couple of minutes a server came over to their booth.  So we got up and left and went down the road to another restaurant.   Very poor service.  Next time we will go to a different location.

detailedReviews.author: Ruth Ellis
detailedReviews.text: They have a great lunch special at terrific price!

detailedReviews.author: DL Jones
detailedReviews.text: Great service. Great food. Prices are reasonable in today's market.

detailedReviews.author: Abby Jarnagin
detailedReviews.text: I have been coming here for 5 years and this Joes tops everyone in the area. We came here for valentine‚Äôs day, and they did not disappoint. Food was great and the touch of love in every dish!

detailedReviews.author: Lori Balchik
detailedReviews.text: We had a new waitress this evening that we have not had the pleasure to meet. Jewels! She made our night! She was fantastic! I couldn't stop laughing when she brought a full bottle of wine to our table with one glass and sat it in front of me.  I was like she is my person! She knows me too well! She is so sweet, innocent, and so considerate! We have been to the restaurant a lot but Jewels really stuck out with her kind, compassionate, and friendly demeanor! We loved her and can't wait to frequent back for her service!

detailedReviews.author: Bill Anderson
detailedReviews.text:
Crust could have been a bit more crispy. If you like the crust soft and doughy it was great.

Many varieties to choose from.

detailedReviews.author: JP Certa
detailedReviews.text: Great food and options for everyone.

detailedReviews.author: Iman Townsend
detailedReviews.text: They have TERRIBLE customer service. We‚Äôve ordered from there multiple times and just recently started having issues with our pizza. One time our pizza barely had sauce. It was like cheese bread and we were told we‚Äôd get a credit for another pizza. Never got the credit. Another time we ordered and my pizza was messed up once again. They said they‚Äôd refund it. A whole week went by and no refund. Called and they said they‚Äôd don‚Äôt do that and they gave me an $8 credit without me knowing for a messed up almost $20 pizza! The manager could care less about trying to make it right. They lie and say one thing but just do whatever without a care for how their customers feel. Will never order from this place again!!!

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Miller
detailedReviews.text: Always good

detailedReviews.author: Marsia Geldert-Murphey
detailedReviews.text: Sorry pics are after the first round of diners at the pizza buffet! We ordered three pizzas for our  diverse family tastes and needs. The Veggie, pepperoni sausage and green pepper, and a sausage and black olive, everyone was happy and satisfied and asked why we don‚Äôt order from here more! We will from now on. Also arrived exactly on time I was given for delivery and their delivery person was super pleasant.

detailedReviews.author: William Hon
detailedReviews.text: So glad I found this place ! Amazing pizza every time and great service and pricing .

detailedReviews.author: Jared Stuemke
detailedReviews.text: Pretty good pizza

detailedReviews.author: Melodie
detailedReviews.text: They didn't have a lot of mixed drinks were out of alot of things. No bloody Mary's etc.

detailedReviews.author: mark brodzinski
detailedReviews.text: Taylor and the rest of the staff were amazing!!! They exceeded all expectations!! Joe's will now be my go to place. Great food, amazing staff,  and awesome owners.

detailedReviews.author: Abby Gruhlke
detailedReviews.text: Great spaghetti, and very affordable!

detailedReviews.author: deborah orofino
detailedReviews.text: Great atmosphere and Adria is the best waitress!  She makes our neighborhood Joes!!

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Finigan
detailedReviews.text: Great food with a large menu.   Service is very friendly and attentive with a great atmosphere for everyone.   Can‚Äôt go wrong with a stop at Joes.

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Finigan
detailedReviews.text: We love joes! Something for everyone! Friendly staff and great atmosphere. Can‚Äôt go wrong! Always 10/10!

detailedReviews.author: Ariella Ibarra
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely love joes pizza! Dining area is always clean, staff is friendly, owners are top notch. They offer a variety of menu items and gluten-free options, that I love!!!

detailedReviews.author: Madeline Connors
detailedReviews.text: Tonight I had the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had from Joes! I love this place! Never disappoints!

detailedReviews.author: Sheila Torimino
detailedReviews.text: Joe's is like the family home to me.  Everyone knows me and that is because the food is so good I go all the time.  Love Joe's

detailedReviews.author: Michael Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Really like the hot honey pepperoni but all the pizzas are great. Keep going back.

detailedReviews.author: Steve
detailedReviews.text: Candy was absolutely amazing!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Justin H
detailedReviews.text: Always a great experience

detailedReviews.author: Jim Davis
detailedReviews.text: Candy is awesome.  Remembers your name, what you like and is super friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Rob Henke
detailedReviews.text: I think her name was candy and she was on top of it

detailedReviews.author: Danny Will
detailedReviews.text: Candy is dandy

detailedReviews.author: Keli Easton
detailedReviews.text: We love Candy!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Manus
detailedReviews.text:
Cory (the owner) was very delightful!

The pizza was tasty and the ambience was great.

Will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Gitcho
detailedReviews.text: Came here for lunch today. The pizza lunch special was delicious and a great deal, and Rachel was outstanding with her service!

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Dunkirk
detailedReviews.text: Great quality food as always. üëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

detailedReviews.author: Deb Grace
detailedReviews.text: Order is always correct!  Food is delicious, and fresh!  Delivery service is on time, and staff is always friendly and helpful!

detailedReviews.author: adam bohnenstiehl
detailedReviews.text: Always great food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Damon Rathgeber
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza place smell! The food is really good quality and taste with large portions. The servers were really nice and friendly. Plenty of tvs for sports.

detailedReviews.author: Kathy Smith
detailedReviews.text: The food is always great and the wait staff is outstanding!

detailedReviews.author: Kassidi Blume
detailedReviews.text: Favorite pizza in town! I am not STL raised, and STL style pizza is not for me.... Thankful to have found an amazing pizza spot that makes us, and all our visitors very happy!

detailedReviews.author: Jenise Anker
detailedReviews.text: The food and service is very amazing,  great customer service and excellent food.

detailedReviews.author: T Carter
detailedReviews.text: 1st time visitor, found it on Google during a trip. 1st look the place looks cool, "trendy". Husband and I ordered a lg speciality pizza, and garlic bread. Thinking we'd love some left overs. When she brought it out, üëÄ I was shocked! And it's delicious!!!! We like pizza anyway, but we hadn't had anything like this before. We will be adding it as a stop on our trips from now on.

detailedReviews.author: Billy Greer
detailedReviews.text: Great staff  awesome food and delicious

detailedReviews.author: Terri Wagner
detailedReviews.text: Carry out was fast and friendly and the pizza was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Shelby Liebel
detailedReviews.text: I called in an order of toasted ravioli and cannoli. I get there and pay, and they force you to tip starting at 15%. I get home and realize the 16 ravioli I ordered, there was only 12 in the box, and for paying $16.49 plus tax, I was going to call them, they remade the order and I came in and picked up the 16 piece. Luckily the house was about 5 minutes away from the restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Charles Parkinson
detailedReviews.text: Salad with house dressing and pizza is some of the best

detailedReviews.author: Abeni Barnhart
detailedReviews.text: Hands down best place in vandalia for good food and service. They‚Äôre always so welcoming and friendly. Serving here is top notch!

detailedReviews.author: Wayne Hubbard
detailedReviews.text: Alway the best at the Edwardsville location

detailedReviews.author: Larry mueller
detailedReviews.text: We love this place.

detailedReviews.author: christine Steinhauer
detailedReviews.text: Joe's is always great!!!

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Schreiber
detailedReviews.text:
We had a large group come in tonight and my family was one of the first to get seated by about 15-20 minutes. Around 40 minutes later other people in the party had drinks and appetizers and we had yet to get asked for our drink order. After another 5 or so minutes we left, and went to another restaurant. Within 5 minutes we were seated, 2 more minutes we had drinks and 10 minutes after that we had food.

If you know weeks ahead of time a big party is coming in, be prepared.

detailedReviews.author: Russell Crane
detailedReviews.text: Nice workers good food thank you

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Hay
detailedReviews.text: Food and service is always top notch. Our go to place for salad and sandwiches. I love the pineapple and Canadian bacon pizza. The kids loves the spaghetti. Something for everyone.

detailedReviews.author: John Provasnik
detailedReviews.text: salid and pizza excellent

detailedReviews.author: Angela Topal
detailedReviews.text: Food and service are always great! The staff is exceptional

detailedReviews.author: Mary Hicks
detailedReviews.text: Great atmosphere; awesome staff and the best food!

detailedReviews.author: Joan humes
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is just so awesome. The delivery was so quick and the guy was so friendly and happy. My husband got so excited when he saw the Joes Delux pizza box tonight!  This is a no crust- Pizza ‚Äî deliciousness from end to end.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Best
detailedReviews.text: Moved to the other side of town from Joes. Pizza is great and crave it regularly! I highly recommend that you try their pizza if you haven‚Äôt yet!  Great place to eat!!

detailedReviews.author: Sean Curtis
detailedReviews.text: Rachel and Olivia are great servers.  You‚Äôre lucky to have them!

detailedReviews.author: Fred Kaucher
detailedReviews.text: I had a very good expirence  there ....my family got done with a funeral  and we decided  to go put to eat afterwards....I got spaghetti  and the rest of my family member had pizzas....I would definitely  go back to joesany time I'm in the area....thank you very much...

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the deliciousness and variety of Joe's Pizza, highlighting their Chicago-style and NYC-style pizzas as the best in the area. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The service at Joe's Pizza is frequently described as friendly, efficient, and attentive, with specific mentions of staff members like Adria and Evony providing exceptional service. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Joe's Pizza offers a large menu with options for everyone, including gluten-free choices, making it a great spot for family or neighborhood gatherings. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and poor service during busy periods - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and unresolved customer complaints - review management can address this concern
Poor online visibility and competition with other restaurants - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

negative.text: We just left the Edwardsville location.  Granted they were busy on a Saturday but we have been there when it has been busy before.  We sat at our table for over 10 minutes.  No one ever came to take our drink order, say hi or anything.  We had 3 servers go by us and no one said one word.  In the meantime, someone sat down behind us and within a couple of minutes a server came over to their booth.  So we got up and left and went down the road to another restaurant.   Very poor service.  Next time we will go to a different location.
